items.question: What USCIS forms does EZMig support?
items.answer: EZMig supports all major family-based immigration forms including I-130, I-485, I-765, I-131, I-864, and I-539. We're constantly adding new forms based on attorney feedback.

items.question: Are the forms accepted by USCIS?
items.answer: Yes! All forms generated by EZMig are USCIS-compliant and use the latest official form versions. Our validation ensures every required field is properly completed.

items.question: How does the AI assistance work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your client's information and suggests answers, catches potential errors, and ensures consistency across related forms. It learns from thousands of successful filings.

items.question: Can I track case status automatically?
items.answer: Yes! EZMig monitors USCIS case status for all your active cases and sends instant notifications when statuses change. No more manual checking required.

items.question: How secure is my client data?
items.answer: Security is our top priority. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We're SOC 2 certified and HIPAA compliant. Your client data never leaves our secure servers.

items.question: Do you offer team or enterprise plans?
items.answer: Yes! Our Growth and Enterprise plans include team collaboration features, shared workspaces, and priority support. Contact our sales team for custom pricing.
